name: LC Accounting Ledger
query:
select
	posting_date as 'Date::100', account as 'Account::150', party_type as 'Party Type::80', party as 'Party::150',
	debit as 'Debit:Currency:80', credit as 'Credit:Currency:80',
	voucher_type as 'Voucher Type::120', voucher_no as 'Voucher No:Dynamic Link/Voucher Type:160', 
	cost_center as 'Cost Center:Link/Cost Center:100', project as 'Project:Link/Project:100',
	against_voucher_type as 'Against Voucher Type::120', against_voucher as 'Against Voucher No:Dynamic Link/Against Voucher Type:160',
	remarks as 'Remarks::400', against as 'Against', is_opening as 'Is Opening'
from `tabGL Entry`
where company=%(company)s and concat(voucher_type, voucher_no) in (
select concat("Purchase Invoice", name) from `tabPurchase Invoice` where project=%(project)s 
union all 
select concat("Purchase Receipt", name) from `tabPurchase Receipt` where project=%(project)s 
union all 
select concat("Journal Entry", name) from `tabJournal Entry` where project=%(project)s  
union all 
select concat("Payment Entry", name) from `tabPayment Entry` where project=%(project)s 
) 
order by posting_date, account
